sentences.sContent: It was some hours before she recovered consciousness .
sentences.sCn: 过了几个小时她才恢复知觉。

sentences.sContent: Once she stumbled, but somehow she recovered her balance and carried on running.
sentences.sCn: 她绊了一下，但还是找回平衡，继续向前跑去。

remMethod.val: re(再， 又) + cover(包括) → 重新获得

words.tran: 可收回的；可恢复的；可补偿的
回收器；财产收回取得者；追索财产者

trans.tranOther: to get back an ability, a sense, or control over your feelings, movements etc after a period without it
